questions.question: Which album includes the hit song 'Love Story'?
questions.explanation: 'Love Story' is one of the hit songs from Taylor Swift's second studio album, 'Fearless', released in 2008.

questions.question: What is Taylor Swift's middle name?
questions.explanation: Taylor Swift's middle name is Alison.

questions.question: Which Taylor Swift album was released in 2014?
questions.explanation: '1989' is Taylor Swift's fifth studio album, released on October 27, 2014.

questions.question: In which year did Taylor Swift move to Nashville to pursue her music career?
questions.explanation: Taylor Swift moved to Nashville in 2004 to pursue her music career.

questions.question: What is the first track on the 'Red (Taylor’s Version)' album?
questions.explanation: The first track on the 'Red (Taylor’s Version)' album is 'State of Grace'.

questions.question: Which of the following songs is NOT from the 'Lover' album?
questions.explanation: 'Delicate' is a song from Taylor Swift's 'Reputation' album, not 'Lover'.

questions.question: Who did Taylor Swift collaborate with on the song 'Exile'?
questions.explanation: Taylor Swift collaborated with Bon Iver on the song 'Exile'.

questions.question: Which of the following albums was released first?
questions.explanation: 'Fearless' was released in 2008 and is Taylor Swift's second studio album.

questions.question: Which actor appeared as Taylor's love interest in the 'We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together' music video?
questions.explanation: Noah Mills appeared as Taylor's love interest in the 'We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together' music video.

questions.question: Who is the 'Back To December' song rumored to be about?
questions.explanation: 'Back To December' is rumored to be about Taylor Lautner.

questions.question: What is the name of Taylor Swift's first album?
questions.explanation: Taylor Swift's first album, released in 2006, is self-titled 'Taylor Swift'.

questions.question: In which year did Taylor Swift receive the Billboard Woman of the Decade Award?
questions.explanation: Taylor Swift received the Billboard Woman of the Decade Award in 2019.

questions.question: Which song features the lyric 'Cause the players gonna play, play, play'?
questions.explanation: The lyric 'Cause the players gonna play, play, play' is from the song 'Shake It Off'.

questions.question: Who did Taylor Swift collaborate with on the song 'End Game'?
questions.explanation: Taylor Swift collaborated with Ed Sheeran and Future on the song 'End Game'.
